content.raw: I think that we are not currently using this gazebodistro file for any of our CI scripts. Only colcon Windows scripts are using gazebodistro and there is no citadel job. My intention was to leave this open until we created the release branches. I’m more afraid about updating this file when the release branches are created than to have the right branches on it now.
content.html: I think that we are not currently using this gazebodistro file for any of our CI scripts. Only colcon Windows scripts are using gazebodistro and there is no citadel job. My intention was to leave this open until we created the release branches. I’m more afraid about updating this file when the release branches are created than to have the right branches on it now.
